channel.title: Dutch Learning Tools
channel.description: Interactive Dutch learning tools for mastering articles, grammar, vocabulary, and language skills. Practice de & het articles, verb conjugations, prepositions, and more with engaging exercises.

item.title: Dutch Articles & Nouns (De & Het)
item.description: Learn Dutch articles (de & het) with 200 most common Dutch nouns. Daily word practice with pronunciation, translations, and categories. Features include daily Dutch word rotation, random word practice, English translations, word categories, and mobile-optimized design.

item.title: Dutch Verb Conjugation
item.description: Master Dutch verb conjugations with interactive exercises. Practice present tense with common Dutch verbs. Features include verb conjugation practice, present tense focus, interactive exercises, progress tracking, and conjugation patterns.

item.title: Dutch Prepositions
item.description: Master Dutch prepositions with interactive exercises. Learn the correct usage of prepositions in different contexts and situations. Features include common prepositions practice, contextual usage examples, real-world scenarios, and Dutch-English comparisons.

item.title: Dutch Verbs with Fixed Preposition
item.description: Master Dutch verbs with fixed prepositions. Learn essential verb-preposition combinations with interactive exercises. Features include fixed verb-preposition pairs, level-based progression (A2-B2), real example sentences, and contextual learning.

item.title: Dutch Conjunctions
item.description: Master Dutch conjunctions with interactive exercises. Learn to connect clauses and express relationships between ideas. Features include coordinating conjunctions, subordinating conjunctions, sentence completion practice, and contextual learning.

item.title: Dutch Adjectives
item.description: Master Dutch adjective declension with interactive exercises. Learn when to use the correct form of adjectives in different contexts. Features include adjective declension practice, multiple choice exercises, instant feedback, detailed explanations, and de/het word recognition.

item.title: Dutch Comparatives & Superlatives
item.description: Master Dutch comparative and superlative forms. Learn to form comparatives (-er) and superlatives (-ste) with interactive exercises. Features include comparative forms practice, superlative forms practice, irregular comparisons, and pattern recognition.

item.title: Dutch Object Pronouns
item.description: Master Dutch object pronouns with interactive exercises. Learn to use the correct pronouns (mij, je, hem, haar, het, ons, jullie, ze) in context. Features include object pronoun practice, personal and formal pronouns, gender agreement practice, and real conversation examples.

item.title: Dutch Reflexive Verbs
item.description: Master Dutch reflexive verbs with interactive exercises. Learn to place reflexive pronouns (me, je, zich, ons) in the correct position within sentences. Features include reflexive pronoun practice, position placement rules, common reflexive verbs, and real sentence examples.

item.title: Dutch Negation
item.description: Master Dutch negation patterns with interactive exercises. Learn when to use "niet", "geen", and modal verbs for correct negative sentences. Features include Niet vs Geen practice, modal verb negation, word order rules, and detailed explanations.

item.title: Dutch Separable Verbs
item.description: Master Dutch separable verbs with interactive sentence completion exercises. Learn how separable verbs split and change position in different contexts. Features include sentence completion practice, multiple tenses and contexts, real-world examples, and verb separation rules.

item.title: Dutch Pronominal Adverbs
item.description: Master Dutch pronominal adverbs with interactive exercises. Learn waar-, wat-, and er- constructions for things and concepts. Features include Waar + preposition practice, Er + preposition constructions, question forms with wat, and grammar pattern recognition.

item.title: Dutch Adverbs Practice
item.description: Master Dutch adverbs by filling in missing words in real sentences. Learn time, degree, frequency, and place adverbs in context. Features include fill-in-the-blank exercises, common spoken Dutch adverbs, contextual learning, category-based filtering, and progressive difficulty (A1-B2).
